column1: Table 1A. Black Alone / Non-Black Alone U.S. Resident Population by Age, Sex, and Series: April 1, 2020 (In thousands)

Notes: Estimates may not sum to totals shown because of rounding. Year of birth refers to events occurring between April 1 and March 31 of the indicated years. For some age-sex-race groups, the estimate for the Low series is higher than the Middle series and the estimate for the High series is lower than the Middle series because adjustments used to develop the range vary across demographic groups. See the 2020 Demographic Analysis methodology statement for more detail: http://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/technical-documentation/methodology.html.
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division, 2020 Demographic Analysis (December 2020 release).
